# Release v6.4.5

## Installation

Download the latest release from [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/mgsgde/whisper-shortcut/releases).

## Changes

### Gemini Chat

- **Input handling**: Refined input handling in the chat input area for a smoother typing experience.
- **Keyboard shortcuts**: Enhanced keyboard shortcuts in the Gemini Chat window for faster navigation and actions.
- **Window behavior**: Added custom window behavior in the Gemini Chat window for better control over positioning and focus.

## Full Changelog

For a complete list of changes, see the [full changelog](https://github.com/mgsgde/whisper-shortcut/compare/v6.4.4...v6.4.5).
